import { useEffect, useRef } from 'react' import './intro.scss' import { init } from 'ityped' export default function Intro() { const textRef= useRef() useEffect(()=>{ init(textRef.current, { showCursor: false, strings: ['Use with React.js!', 'Yeah!' ] }) },[]) return (

Hi there, I'm

Manikanth Babu

Front-End-Developer

) }
